website_summaries.verdict: A handmade Italian helmet that combines style and safety.
pros: This helmet is praised by customers for its fit, safety, weight, and style
The lightweight design makes it extremely comfortable, and several customers reported that it does an excellent job of protecting your head in a crash
The aerodynamic design makes this a good choice for competitive cyclists
cons: This is one of the more expensive road bike helmets available

customer_reviews.title: I Never Knew..
customer_reviews.text: I've been riding bikes for years and helmets were just something I bought to be "safe". Thing is, I wasn't safe. There's no way my previous helmets would have stayed on my head to protect me. They were ill fitting; I just assumed all helmets were that way. When trying this helmet on I thought I bought the wrong size. After a couple minutes of adjusting I experienced how a bike helmet should fit. Unlike my other helmets this one slips on and doesn't move. It fits my head perfectly, it's comfortable and it's looks like a million bucks. Luckily I haven't had any bad accidents. Take care of your head with this helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Flying Irish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Aero Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I've had the pleasure to have owned this helmet for a few months now and I am very happy with this purchase. I will admit i read many reviews and watched too many videos before deciding on the purchase of this particular helmet. It already had outstanding marks from a lot of different editorials in the cycling community and had a lot of features I was looking for(aero, lightweight, adjustability, antimicrobial chinstrap). I hope i never need to use it as protection, but I feel confident that it will be adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Life
customer_reviews.text: I just had the worst accident in my 10 years of road cycling. This helmet saved my life. I hit hard on the back left of my head and walked away with an arm fracture, sprained wrist, bruised ribs, but no concussion or head trauma. This helmet did its job and cracked a bit but I didn't. I just bought another Kask Protone. Please wear a good helmet and fit it right.
customer_reviews.author: B Chase

customer_reviews.title: Saved me during crash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet few weeks ago. Fits nicely, no wind noise. I had a nasty crash, fractured my collarbone & hit me head pretty hard on the pavement but helmet protected me really well, didn't feel a thing, didn't lose consciousness. In fact barely noticed the contact with pavement. Will buy another before I ride again
customer_reviews.author: Irf

customer_reviews.title: Head retention strap falls out of front right snap
customer_reviews.text: For the money, you're better off with something else. I would think a high dollar helmet would be better made. Fit is ok, but the main reason I'm returning this for another brand is that the snap holding the retention system to the front right of the helmet fails to stay in. It just falls out. The front left snaps in and out, but the right is loose. Shoddy design, poor quality control, who knows. Lost my business.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M Bania

customer_reviews.title: Excellent helmet.
customer_reviews.text: For my 57cm head went with medium which fits like a glove with included padding although I would not mind slightly deeper fit. Still these helmets look nowhere as mushroomie as the other more common designs. Plenty options for adjustment with vartical/horizontal retainer system. Tried the large one and there was too much wiggle room side to side but it sat lower. Probably someone between sizes could consider larger size if riding with a cold weather cap.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been an avid cyclist for almost forty years and my "Kask Protone", is the best helmet I have ever worn. The fit is awesome, looks are great (usually get very positive comments from fellow riders), and the vents on long hot rides in New Mexico are fantastic. Price is high, but I was able to get my Kask at a $50 discount (well worth the cost).
customer_reviews.author: Danny G.

customer_reviews.title: Ultimate in comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic helmet. It looks great, fits great and is lightweight. I bought a helmet a few months ago with MIPS and I was terribly disappointed. All of the MIPS helmets I have seen have a sheet of plastic between your head and the helmet. These are the hottest helmets I have worn. I believe there is a bigger risk of injury from heat exhaustion than any benefit MIPS might provide. I love the Kask Protone and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Zandstra

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Giro for about ten years however as soon as I laid this noggin protector upon my dome, the heavens opened up and the angels sang. The fit is like no other - almost as if it was molded just for me. On top of that it's lightweight, has amazing ventilation, and it's sexy as all get out. If it wasn't so expensive, I'd buy one in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST helmet. Extremely lightweight, aerodynamic with great airflow. Leather chin strap is excellent! Truthfully it’s so comfortable I’ve actually had times where I forgot I was even wearing it! After an email to Kask headquarters, I verified that the helmets being sold by this retailer are indeed authentic. Buy this helmet, it will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Helmet
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this helmet for style for months. Fit/adjustability is better than expected. Very comfortable. You get what you pay for with this helmet. GREAT QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Wanna feel violated? Buy a Kask
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice no frills helmet however BE AWARE, replace parts, particularly replacement pads are very difficult to find and very expensive $22.00 plus tax and shipping. I’ve owned Bell and 6D and Giro and never have felt bent over like I do with Kask. Never again
customer_reviews.author: Rossana Magalhaes

customer_reviews.title: Probably worth the money. Same helmet the Tour De France guys use.
customer_reviews.text: Light, fits well, quiet in the wind. Some cheaper helmets make noise when descending fast, not this one. Good ventilation. You can probably get a helmet that's just as safe for cheaper, but this one is very well ventilated and quiet. Oh yeah, team SKY (Ineos) uses it, whatever.
customer_reviews.author: doctor_speed

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of helmets this is by far the best one yet. love the chin strap (soft) like more adjustments this helmet has than others. Great quality and well made.really like how it sits above your ears. Don't look like you have a mushroom on top of your head.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I own!
customer_reviews.text: Best helmet I’ve owned to date. The adjustments on the back are quick and easy. Helmet is super light with great airflow. This replaced my POC octal and everything about it is an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Wambo

customer_reviews.title: Still an amazing helmet
customer_reviews.text: Kask and the folks at Team Ineos may have moved on to newer helmets. this one still a good option. Good boa to adjust fit on head with a faux leather chin strap. Offers good ventilation especilly in hot climates.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great looking helmet let down by poor plastic fitment elements
customer_reviews.text: Snug fitting helmet, looks great. Unfortunately the helmet is let down by the poor quality of the plastic elements that fit the shell to the head - given the cost it should be a lot better. Had a Lazer helmet previously that had much better quality components fitting it to the head.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Hammerbeck

customer_reviews.title: Fits fantastically!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic helmet. I've been riding for 20 years now and this is the most comfortable helmet I've ever worn. The extra swinging adjustment to conform to my head is worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: wyliecritr

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on my head
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way if fits and the looks specially the back is nice and rounded without the tail that looks like a rocket and is very light and I like the fact that is made in in Italy.
customer_reviews.author: EZ Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Best Helmets
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Kask Helmet. Firts I had the Mojito for 4 years, which I Loved. To keep with Kask now I bought the Protone and fits perfect, kask has the must confortable helmets and the protone design is awesome, very lightweight and fresh. I would recomend this helmeth 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Adolfo

customer_reviews.title: Best Helmet I’ve had so far.
customer_reviews.text: Best helmet I’ve had. Fits snug and really feels like part of my body as I’m cycling. Other helmets have felt like they are just sitting on my head. Great ventilation and looks great too. Not super oversized. A couple things I would love to see improvements on: the strap is great but hard to adjust on the fly. It’s quite expensive. I wish these helmets were more in the $175 category.
customer_reviews.author: Siavash

customer_reviews.title: Best looking most comfortable helmet I have worn
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable two of the biggest qualities I look for in a helmet. It is great that they offer so many awesome paint jobs as well. Might not want to use this for winter riding but the airflow and ventilation are superb making this great for my ultra distance rides.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Williamosn

customer_reviews.title: Crash tested. It works.
customer_reviews.text: My first one saved my noggin on a recent crash. Dented the helmet but my head didn't feel a thing. Replaced with the same one. Best fitting helmet i've ever had. Period. It disappears on your head and provides wonderful ventilation.
customer_reviews.author: Eric SF

customer_reviews.title: Safety + huge air flow !
customer_reviews.text: Awesome helmet, a bit pricy but everything related to safety out there is worthy. It makes my rides more comfortable -big air flow-. Also lightweight, low profile, and good looking. I’m happier now in every ride 🙂
customer_reviews.author: savhanna2004

customer_reviews.title: The finest cycle helmet
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, great comfort level and stylish. I now own three Kask and will never consider another brand after the thousands of miles I've worn my Kask helmets. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Best helmet I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: The Kask Protone is a fantastic bike helmet that is aerodynamic fits well and looks great. If a helmet fit well, it is easily worn.
customer_reviews.author: BadgerDan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Helmet!
customer_reviews.text: I quit being cheap and decided to get the helmet I really wanted. I had been going to all the local shops looking for the perfect helmet, but never found one (the CatLike Whisper was close, but needed a large). So I decided to take a chance and get this one online. I am not disappointed! Fits perfectly, looks good and is very light. My old 9 year old LAS helmet is going to be retired!
customer_reviews.author: Marc G

customer_reviews.title: The Most Comfortable Road Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is so comfortable. I have a small head and love the way it cradles my head. I feel full support without any bouncing or pressure points. The leather straps are non-abrasive and stay in position. Ventilation system is cool and aero. I am female and the size small is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Angela in Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Great but not all sunglasses compatible with this helmet.
customer_reviews.text: Super helmet. Medium size fits me perfectly and securely. All around an excellent choice. Only negative factor is that not all sunglasses fit well with this helmet. Long-arm sunglasses hit the back of the helmet on the sides so be sure to have have short-arm sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Juan B

customer_reviews.title: Annoying ratchet system
customer_reviews.text: The ratcheting system will not stay put on bumpy roads. I wish there was some mechanism for locking it in place.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Light weight comfortable and compatible with any sunglasses (Oakley
customer_reviews.text: Light weight comfortable and compatible with any sunglasses (Oakley, POC, SmithOptics). The chin strap is very comfortable, made of soft leather. The aerodynamics of the helmet are a class above. Give it a try, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: C.DeMoss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made looks sharp. Less noise than giro synthe. Slightly smaller fit than giro helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient air vents and it's my color.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helmet. The vents allow sufficient air to pass through. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: George J  Gilles

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my dad for Christmas and he can’t stop talking about how wonderful it is. It’s pricey, but worth every penny. You can’t put a price tag on safety! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking helmet and i see lots of pro bikers ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking helmet and i see lots of pro bikers wearing Kask. I find it a drop tight on the back of my head- but I still wear it off and on with my other helmets
customer_reviews.author: ling ling chee

customer_reviews.title: Love the FIT!
customer_reviews.text: It's true what they say....this helmet fits lower around your head. I normally ride Giro but this fit system is much more comfortable. You hardly feel like you have it on!
customer_reviews.author: SJWiZ

customer_reviews.title: Safety is everything for your head!
customer_reviews.text: Helmet has a smaller profile, light, and recently protected me during a hard fall!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Humphries

customer_reviews.title: Childrens or Adult ?
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I received a children's helmet or what happened. Its the same size as the one I tried in the store, just a different colour. Super excited to get it and it does not fit at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Fit awesome... Helmet terrible condition.
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy the Small o/s because Australia doesn’t seem to import the small and I have a little head. I’m not sure what’s happened to this helmet but if I was KASK I would be mortified to ship it to a customer. The finish is absolutely terrible and rough. I got the helmet for a great price but it looks like it fell off the seconds shelf. I am very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Price

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had the unfortunate experience of writing a review of how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Mask Protone Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Love love this helmet. Fits nicely and it is truly light weight.
customer_reviews.author: susann

customer_reviews.title: I love my Kask Protone
customer_reviews.text: I love my Kask Protone! This is my second one. I usually wear size medium but the size small was priced to steal, so I had to get it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool helmet
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust the suspension. Sits a little higher on my head due to its depth. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The helmets retention system is as good as others state. A very comfortable and secure feeling brain cage. As a daily Atlanta commuter it gets a bit warm but this helmets ventilation is fantastic. Two thumbs up Roger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great fit, light and superior styling
customer_reviews.text: I'm an avid cyclist and this is the best helmet I have owned. Not cheap but would highly recommend if you are in the market for a new helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: A little bit on the expensive side but you get what you pay for. When using watch out for the bubber pading on either side of the the adjustment dial at the back (not sure what they are called), I noticed it twisted and started to come off after a couple of rides.
customer_reviews.author: Rye N

customer_reviews.title: Last helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my husbNd, who is an avid cyclist and has worn many helmets over the years. He LOVES it!!! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lynne from co

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet
customer_reviews.text: I really like the way the helmet fits me. It sits just right on my head. I now have multiple of these. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gossamer

customer_reviews.title: Initial fit adjustments took 5 minutes. Great strap and so easy to get a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: I've been cycling for almost 30 years and have had lots of helmets. The Kask Protone is, by far, the best helmet I have ever owned. The price of $249 was a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Cycholist

customer_reviews.title: Comfort like never before.
customer_reviews.text: My fifth helmet in search of comfort and air flow. By far the best I have ever owned/worn. And bonus points for making a huge head look normal.
customer_reviews.author: John Barclay

customer_reviews.title: Kask helmet is worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! This is my second Kask helmet, so I knew the quality I would expect. This helmet does not disappoint! It's wrll-vented, comfortable and adjusts to a level of comfort that cant be experienced with any other helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Patnode

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, light, aero but with good ventilation, and it doesn't give you the mushroom head look. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: j2t

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, looks great, pretty aero road helmet. I have no complaints. It is built well and has good ventilation. Hopefully, I'll never have to actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: lil_buckeroo

customer_reviews.title: I like the design
customer_reviews.text: I like the design, how it fits and the weight but I DONT like that the letters are stickers, not sure how they will last during rainy season.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Masferrer

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet. Sticking with Kask from now on.
customer_reviews.text: I've had nothing but Specialized helmets and this by far is the most comfortable helmet I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for this to come on sale. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Quintus

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have tinnitus and this helmet helps - it does not create the blasting wind noise that others do. Specifically it is more quiet than my older Mojito.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting helmet
customer_reviews.text: Good fitting helmet, chin strap is leather, multiple adjustments, comfortable. Good air flow to your head, low ear noise. Made in Italy, CPSC approved!
customer_reviews.author: Wolfbenz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great comfort, even in cold weather with an skull cap. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: W. Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Great Ventalation 9 out of 10 Bugs Agree
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ventilation, but I've also caught more than a few bugs. Fits slightly smaller than most Medium helmets I've had before. The rear adjustable straps don't stay put and also the rear tips of my sunglasses have been causing a little pain due to the adjustable straps in the back of the helmet. There was also a lot of foam stuck to the helmet that I had to pick off. All and all, really light and a good helmet
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: you'll be as good as froomey when you wear this
customer_reviews.text: this helmet gives you additional wattage. you'll be as good as froomey when you wear this helmet
customer_reviews.author: BukLao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is the best helmet I have had. Very aerodynamic, comfortable and it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmut, best fit- no head aches, doesn't move, well vented. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kate24

customer_reviews.title: Kask Protone
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping, this kask helmet looks amazing. Now I’m ready for Tour de France
customer_reviews.author: radhames crisotomo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, fits good and is light. Large was perfect for my large head without having the mushroom look.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great air flow, comfortable, and you don't notice it's really on.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Cominski

customer_reviews.title: Overprized and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is terribly overprized and has some serious construction flaws.The plastic materila which holds the strips is much too thin and breaks easily..The strips are held in place by a thin rubber strip which is glued to plastic.It easily breaks the strip slips out and plastic poke,s into your head.
customer_reviews.author: analyst1946

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. It saved me from a serious head ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. It saved me from a serious head injury in a bike crash.
customer_reviews.author: conrad

customer_reviews.title: my wife
customer_reviews.text: The fit of the helmet was exceptional. Very light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Person

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice helmet very comfortable and lightweight excellent quality and good air ventilation
customer_reviews.author: degly

customer_reviews.title: Find a helmet that fits you.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is perfect on me, 4/5 on the look, aerocomfort 4/5. For me this is the best looking yet expensive helmet i have so far.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Evan A. Singson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing helmets. I have 2 and my partner has this one. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Carrico

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Item is so much better in person. Use it for my road bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great comfort helmet
customer_reviews.text: love the helmet, lightweight, comfortable and stays put. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great helmet, gif very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's a great helmet, gif very nice , but the logos are stickers lol what joke for such an expensive helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. NO issues at all. Feels great and works with my Oakleys Path sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, exactly what I was looking for and meet all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dean K.

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. A little expensive but amazon seems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. A little expensive but amazon seems to have the best deal. The manufacture date on it shows it to be about 6 months old - most of the bike shops i checked it out at had even older manufacturer dates.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence G Finney

customer_reviews.title: Giro Synthe has way better quality than this overrated helmet
customer_reviews.text: Almost $300 helmet and logos are made of stickers. Giro Synthe has way better quality than this overrated helmet. The shell was poorly done, but I love the straps. Other high end helmets logos are painted or engraved. Stickers for KASK?! LOL!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K Javier

customer_reviews.title: Nice biking helmet
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet looks good and hope i never need it's protection.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Vignali

product_meta.title: Kask Protone Helmet
product_meta.description: Developed in collaboration with team sky, the Kask protone road helmet is super-lightweight, highly ventilated and aerodynamic, plus its skull-hugging, low-profile design feels like it was specially Fitted for your head. It's been wind-tunnel tested to maintain streamlined performance and ventilation in virtually any riding position; even if you move your head, it'll remain consistent. It's also been designed using computational fluid dynamics software to attain one of the lowest drag coefficients of any ventilated helmet.
feature_bullets: Handmade in Italy - crafted with the worlds finest materials and hours of pain staking hand work
Wind tunnel tested - the protone boasts the lowest drag co-efficient of any ventilated helmet available
All about fit - Kask octofit adjustment system guarantees a perfect fit
Lightweight comfort - weighs just 230G and uses 3D Dry padding and eco-leather Chinstrap
Safety first - all Kask helmets are CPSC Certified, which means they meet and exceed all US safety standards for bicycle helmets
